author: mjc
msg: Thiago Zaninotti reported to security@apache.org on 20060410 a possible
cross-site scripting flaw because the Expect header error message isn't
escaped.  We couldn't find a way that this could be used by an attacker
however, as they can't influence the Expect header a victim will send to a
target site.  Thiago agreed and we're therefore not treating this as a
security flaw, but it is a bug that ought to get fixed.  I'll add to

author: aheritier
msg: Use the new layout for directories in the bootstrap. From now we have subdirectories for plugins and core directly at the same level using the trunks shortcut in SVN.

author: cziegeler
msg: Make template block compilable with JDK 13 and enable it in 2.1.x by default
